sentences.en: Callus bone mineral density increased continuously in normal beagle fracture healing models.
sentences.cn: 2周时骨折端骨密度达到正常侧水平.

sentences.en: Callus induction and plant regeneration capacity of different varieties were significantly different.
sentences.cn: 2不同品种在诱导愈伤和分化再生上都有显著的基因型差异.

sentences.en: Callus was induced from explants of cassava stem with bud and shootlet.
sentences.cn: 用木薯茎切段及顶芽作为外植体,诱导木薯愈伤组织的形成.

sentences.en: Fig 2. Differentiation of young shoots from transformed callus.
sentences.cn: 图2:从基因枪轰击过的愈伤组织分化出大量的小苗.

sentences.en: I walked to him and took his outstretched hand which was rough with callus.
sentences.cn: 我走向他，握起他那长满老茧的手。

sentences.en: NaCl stress inhibited the differentiation of callus and plant regeneration.
sentences.cn: 盐胁迫抑制了愈伤组织的分化和植株再生.

sentences.en: P 333 promoted callus induction of three cultivars other than Dixie Green.
sentences.cn: PP333仅对迪斯绿有抑制作用,而对其它3个品种起一定的促进作用.

sentences.en: PP 333 promote callus induction of ttiree kinds of varieties except Dixie Green.
sentences.cn: PP333除了对迪斯绿有抑制作用外,对其它3种高羊茅的愈伤诱导都起促进作用.

sentences.en: Somatic Embryogenesis from Protoplast - derived Callus in Soybean ( Glycine max L. )
sentences.cn: 大豆原生质体愈伤组织的体细胞胚胎发生 ( 英文 )

sentences.en: The callus juice can also do on the early growth.
sentences.cn: 愈伤组织匀浆液也可促进菌丝体早期生长.

sentences.en: The callus originated from several parts , but mainly from cambium.
sentences.cn: 愈伤组织是多起源的, 但主要源于形成层.

sentences.en: There was no significant correlation between callus induction and plant regeneration.
sentences.cn: 3愈伤组织诱导率和分化率之间无显著相关性.

sentences.en: This callus generally lasts for about three weeks.
sentences.cn: 一般来说这种痂能够存留大约三星期.

sentences.en: To induce callus tissues and establish suspension culture of Marchantia polymorpha L.
sentences.cn: 目的探计对地钱愈伤组织的诱导和悬浮细胞培养的条件.

sentences.en: Today, I crawl out the fully defeated wound callus.
sentences.cn: 今天, 我爬出满是失败创伤的老茧.
